titleStmt.title: The VVelsh-mans propositions to the Arch-Bishop of Yorke, commander in chiefe before Conovvay Castle in VVales. With their new lawes, and orders of warre propounded by them, and a motion for peace.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, of his cosen Taffies carier, 1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
